name: cufflinks
title: Cufflinks
summary: Determines abundance of reads per isoform/gene from a BAM file and genome annotation in FPKM units.

inputSpec.label: Mappings
inputSpec.help: A coordinate-sorted BAM file with the RNA-Seq mappings.
inputSpec.name: sorted_bam

inputSpec.label: Tuxedo resource archive
inputSpec.help: A gzipped tar archive with the Tuxedo resources (genome and genes). See the Tuxedo Resource Builder for more information.
inputSpec.name: tuxedo_resource_targz

inputSpec.help: Advanced command line options that will be supplied directly to the Cufflinks execution.
inputSpec.label: Advanced command line options
inputSpec.name: advanced_options

outputSpec.label: Results
outputSpec.help: A set of files as output by Cufflinks. See http://cufflinks.cbcb.umd.edu/manual.html#cufflinks_output for more information.
outputSpec.name: results
